alert.note: Alert for Marion; Morgan (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 10:55PM EDT until March 25 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers and locations in Indiana... East Fork White River at Seymour. White River below Eagle Valley Power Plant, near Centerton, Spencer, Hazleton, Newberry, Petersburg, Edwardsport, Elliston, and Ravenswood. Eel River at Bowling Green. .Rainfall totals late last week as high as one inch, and additional rainfall of one to two plus inches from Tuesday through today, is leading to lowland flooding along the entire length of the Wabash River, on the White River from Centerton downstream, and on the East Fork White River at Seymour. Flooding in Greene County today led to a road closure on State Road 43 between State Road 54 and State Road 58. Flooding on the Wabash and White is expected to last into the first week of April, and on the East Fork White until March 27. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Ravenswood. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 6.0 feet, Lowest portion of Ravenswood begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 6.3 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
